description: Returns a list of all currently running remote access sessions.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the project about which you are requesting information.

nested_items.name: remoteAccessSessions
nested_items.description: A container that represents the metadata from the service about each remote access session you are requesting.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the remote access session.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the remote access session.

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date and time the remote access session was created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the remote access session. Can be any of the following:
PENDING.
PENDING_CONCURRENCY.
PENDING_DEVICE.
PROCESSING.
SCHEDULING.
PREPARING.
RUNNING.
COMPLETED.
STOPPING.

nested_items.name: result
nested_items.description: The result of the remote access session. Can be any of the following:
PENDING.
PASSED.
WARNED.
FAILED.
SKIPPED.
ERRORED.
STOPPED.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message about the remote access session.

nested_items.name: started
nested_items.description: The date and time the remote access session was started.

nested_items.name: stopped
nested_items.description: The date and time the remote access session was stopped.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The device's ARN.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The device's display name.

nested_items.name: manufacturer
nested_items.description: The device's manufacturer name.

nested_items.name: model
nested_items.description: The device's model name.

nested_items.name: modelId
nested_items.description: The device's model ID.

nested_items.name: formFactor
nested_items.description: The device's form factor.
PHONE.
TABLET.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The device's platform.
ANDROID.
IOS.

nested_items.name: os
nested_items.description: The device's operating system type.

nested_items.name: frequency
nested_items.description: The CPU's frequency.

nested_items.name: architecture
nested_items.description: The CPU's architecture (for example, x86 or ARM).

nested_items.name: clock
nested_items.description: The clock speed of the device's CPU, expressed in hertz (Hz). For example, a 1.2 GHz CPU is expressed as 1200000000.

nested_items.name: resolution
nested_items.description: The resolution of the device.

nested_items.name: width
nested_items.description: The screen resolution's width, expressed in pixels.

nested_items.name: height
nested_items.description: The screen resolution's height, expressed in pixels.

nested_items.name: heapSize
nested_items.description: The device's heap size, expressed in bytes.

nested_items.name: memory
nested_items.description: The device's total memory size, expressed in bytes.

nested_items.name: image
nested_items.description: The device's image name.

nested_items.name: carrier
nested_items.description: The device's carrier.

nested_items.name: radio
nested_items.description: The device's radio.

nested_items.name: remoteAccessEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether remote access has been enabled for the specified device.

nested_items.name: remoteDebugEnabled
nested_items.description: This flag is set to true if remote debugging is enabled for the device.

nested_items.name: fleetType
nested_items.description: The type of fleet to which this device belongs. Possible values are PRIVATE and PUBLIC.

nested_items.name: fleetName
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet to which this device belongs.

nested_items.name: instances
nested_items.description: The instances that belong to this device.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device instance.

nested_items.name: deviceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the device.

nested_items.name: labels
nested_items.description: An array of strings that describe the device instance.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the device instance. Valid values are listed here.

nested_items.name: udid
nested_items.description: Unique device identifier for the device instance.

nested_items.name: instanceProfile
nested_items.description: A object that contains information about the instance profile.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile.

nested_items.name: packageCleanup
nested_items.description: When set to true, Device Farm removes app packages after a test run. The default value is false for private devices.

nested_items.name: excludeAppPackagesFromCleanup
nested_items.description: An array of strings containing the list of app packages that should not be cleaned up from the device after a test run completes.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: rebootAfterUse
nested_items.description: When set to true, Device Farm reboots the instance after a test run. The default value is true.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the instance profile.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the instance profile.

nested_items.name: availability
nested_items.description: Indicates how likely a device is available for a test run. Currently available in the  ListDevices and GetDevice API methods.

nested_items.name: instanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the instance.

nested_items.name: remoteDebugEnabled
nested_items.description: This flag is set to true if remote debugging is enabled for the remote access session.

nested_items.name: remoteRecordEnabled
nested_items.description: This flag is set to true if remote recording is enabled for the remote access session.

nested_items.name: remoteRecordAppArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the app to be recorded in the remote access session.

nested_items.name: hostAddress
nested_items.description: IP address of the EC2 host where you need to connect to remotely debug devices. Only returned if remote debugging is enabled for the remote access session.

nested_items.name: clientId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of your client for the remote access session. Only returned if remote debugging is enabled for the remote access session.

nested_items.name: billingMethod
nested_items.description: The billing method of the remote access session. Possible values include METERED or UNMETERED. For more information about metered devices, see AWS Device Farm terminology.

nested_items.name: deviceMinutes
nested_items.description: The number of minutes a device is used in a remote access session (including setup and teardown minutes).

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: When specified, represents the total minutes used by the resource to run tests.

nested_items.name: metered
nested_items.description: When specified, represents only the sum of metered minutes used by the resource to run tests.

nested_items.name: unmetered
nested_items.description: When specified, represents only the sum of unmetered minutes used by the resource to run tests.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint for the remote access sesssion.

nested_items.name: deviceUdid
nested_items.description: Unique device identifier for the remote device. Only returned if remote debugging is enabled for the remote access session.

nested_items.name: interactionMode
nested_items.description: The interaction mode of the remote access session. Valid values are:
INTERACTIVE: You can interact with the iOS device by viewing, touching, and rotating the screen. You cannot run XCUITest framework-based tests in this mode.
NO_VIDEO: You are connected to the device, but cannot interact with it or view the screen. This mode has the fastest test execution speed. You can run XCUITest framework-based tests in this mode.
VIDEO_ONLY: You can view the screen, but cannot touch or rotate it. You can run XCUITest framework-based tests and watch the screen in this mode.

nested_items.name: skipAppResign
nested_items.description: When set to true, for private devices, Device Farm does not sign your app again. For public devices, Device Farm always signs your apps again.

nested_items.name: vpcConfig
nested_items.description: The VPC security groups and subnets that are attached to a project.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: An array of one or more security groups IDs in your Amazon VPC.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: An array of one or more subnet IDs in your Amazon VPC.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon VPC.

nested_items.name: deviceProxy
nested_items.description: The device proxy configured for the remote access session.

nested_items.name: host
nested_items.description: Hostname or IPv4 address of the proxy.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port number on which the http/s proxy is listening.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An identifier that was returned from the previous call to this operation, which can be used to return the next set of items in the list.
